## RemirrorInterpolation type

A union of types which are acceptable inputs for styling within remirror.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RemirrorInterpolation = WithVariants<SxThemeProp> | ((theme?: RemirrorTheme | {
    theme: RemirrorTheme;
} | undefined) => WithVariants<SxThemeProp>) | undefined | null | false | string | SerializedStyles | Array<WithVariants<SxThemeProp> | ((theme?: RemirrorTheme | {
    theme: RemirrorTheme;
} | undefined) => WithVariants<SxThemeProp>) | undefined | null | false | string | SerializedStyles>;
```
